name: UKR
description: UKR  is a sprawling adventure platformer where the player takes control over Nikola, one of few hunters for evil spirits. Your task is to crush crowds of wizards, witches, zombies and other evil imps. Help Nichola to clean the native farm of the servants of Devil. In fields and villages, dungeons and mountains - everywhere they are waiting for your help to cleanse the world of evil.
